biotools.summary: Confident detection of microRNA editing | Confident detection of A-to-I miRNA editing events in small-RNA seq data | miRmedon it's a python3 code which takes fastq file of trimmed small-RNA reads, and reports on A-to-I editing events detected in the data. In addition, miRmedon reports on read counts and sequence of both edited and non-edited miRNAs. miRmedon require several extrenal softwares and python libraries, as descirbed below

bioschemas.name: miRmedon
